In its most literal sense without any derogatory connotation, "homo" could refer to *Homo sapiens*, our scientific genus name as humans. However, historically and unfortunately, this word has been used as a slur against lesbian, gay, bisexual, transgender, queer, and intersex (LGBTQI+) individuals. This usage is highly offensive and considered hate speech.
